title: Legatum distribuendum in nuptiis mulierum pauperum distribui debet in nuptiis virginum, non viduarum.
author: University of Cambridge.
notes: The first of four poems on 2 leaves. The others are: "Venditio iuris-iurandi relligione minoris obstructa, firma permanet", "Eadem res duobus vendita, cui prius tradita, non cui prius vendita est, debetur ..", and "Qui aliorum falso vsus est insignibus, incurrit crimen falsi ..".
Identified as STC 15386 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
